tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Tutorial 
1. Use the filter symbol in the top right corner to select a relevant component. This selection is called management zone.
2. If there are spikes in the charts you can select the captions above a chart. This will bring you to a screen made for troubleshooting. 
  1. You can either adopt the dimensions, or use the "..." menu to analyse a problem. A purepath represent a single transaction and gives detailed information to a particular request.
